name: Settlers of the Frontier
description:
Strategically build your village and defend it from enemies!

Settlers of the Frontier is a strategy game where you aim to build an optimal village on a randomly generated island. Structures are scored based on what lies in the surrounding area, so placing them in the right spot is a key component of the game. '

=== CONTROLS ===

Left-click: select and place tiles

Right-click: read a tile's description (can also be used on tile selection buttons)
